watchers.title: Watchers
watchers.text: Watchers shows a selection of movies that are available online or will be soon. For now, it includes a movie list and a watchlist. I will soon develop and add to it series, filters and a progressive web application.

nikki.title: Nikki
nikki.text: I built Nikki to have a web application to help me write a daily diary in a foreign language. I can write, use the translator and have a voice play the translation. Finally, I can save the words I looked up and wrote down.

jiujiTheory.title: Jiuji Theory
jiujiTheory.text: As I practice jiujitsu, I wanted to have an application to keep track of the techniques we learn. Also I will develop it to have related videos embedded, social account and filters. As also plan on building a progressive web app or a native mobile application for it (since I also write on the way home)
